constituent: convenience, person, grow late, Ameratasu, one, ceiling, sun, tucked under the arm
heisigStory: Person . . . grow late. Hint: this kanji also means that unmentionable material that one disposes of when one goes to the "conveniences."
koohiiStory1: Mr. T loves the convenience of the new konbini. Not only does it stay open even if it grows late, they have brand new toilets, and a Post Office!
koohiiStory2: Mr. T takes a dump on the floor of a convenience store. Well, it was growing late and he couldn´t wait. He pities the fool who will have to clean it up!
